text: "Apologize" is a song released by OneRepublic. It is on their first album, Dreaming Out Loud. The song charted well around the world. It reached number one in Australia, Austria, Germany, New Zealand, Sweden, Turkey, The Netherlands and the United World Chart. The song has reached the United States and United Kingdom Top 5. It spent thirteen weeks at number one in Canada. It was ranked 15th in the Year End Chart of the United World Chart. == Other websites == * "Apologize" music video with lyrics * "Apologize" music video featuring Timbaland, with lyrics Category:OneRepublic songs Category:Timbaland songs Category:2006 songs
title: Apologize (song)
